import React from 'react' import ConverterStyle from './ConverterStyle' import chroma from 'chroma-js' import { useState } from 'react' const ColorConverter = () => { const banana = 'hsl(350, 10%, 88%)' console.log(banana) const [enteredValue, setEnteredValue] = useState('hsl(350, 10%, 88%)') const [hexConverted, setHexConverted] = useState('') const converterValue = (e) => { setEnteredValue(e.target.value) setHexConverted(chroma(enteredValue).hex()) } return (

Color Converter

convert to

{enteredValue}

{hexConverted}

 ) } export default ColorConverter
